comment: If a vertex in a simple graph has degree 0, the vertex is not adjacent to another vertex via an edge. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 20-Dec-2017.) (Revised by AV, 16-Dec-2020.) (Proof shortened by AV, 23-Dec-2020.)
